item.title: Update README.md

item.title: Updated IDE
item.description:
http://brackets.io/ - Brackets is an open-source text editor specifically designed for web development. It is lightweight, easy to use, and highly customizable.
https://www.sublimetext.com/ - - Sublime Text is a popular, versatile, and highly customizable text editor used for coding and text editing tasks.
https://phpsandbox.io/ - Online development environment for PHP

item.title: Added WishKit
item.description: https://wishkit.io - Collect in-app user feedback for your iOS/macOS app and prioritize features based on user votes. Free plan up to 1 app.

item.title: add lost-pixel.com to the list
item.description: https://lost-pixel.com - holistic visual regression testing for your Storybook, Ladle, Histoire stories and Web Apps. Unlimited team members, totally free for open-source, 7,000 snapshots/month.

item.title: Added the IP API named ipapi.is to the list
item.description: https://ipapi.is/ - A reliable IP Address API from Developers for Developers with the best Hosting Detection capabilities that exist. The free plan offers 1000 lookups without signup.

item.title: added corbado to authentication, authorization, and user management
item.description: https://www.corbado.com/ - Add passkey-first authentication to new or existing apps. Free for unlimited MAUs.

item.title: add xitoring
item.description: https://xitoring.com/ - Uptime monitoring: 20 free, Linux and Windows Server monitoring: 5 free, Status page: 1 free - Mobile app, multiple notification channel, and much more!

item.title: Update Design and UI list
item.description: https://tw-elements.com/ - - Free Bootstrap components recreated with Tailwind CSS, but with better design and more functionalities.
